channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR

item.title: Report X-2023090278
item.description:
Report X-2023090278

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: MABELVALE
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: discovered by QA during VSA coded by driver as code 6 refused because of damage. was taken to an Admin and opened to conduct inspection. DescribePack: loose caps resulted in internal leakage on one bottle out of 4 packaged. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: placed in hazardous bin.
